verbs.description: [ARG0: Immigration attorney R. Andrew Free] [V: recalled] [ARG1: a 2015 exchange with President Barack Obama , when his administration housed asylum - seekers in the US] . He argues the fallout from President Donald Trump 's current " zero - tolerance " policy is an extension of decisions made in the Obama administration .
